name: Deadly Demolition Car Derby
description:
The first 3D demolition derby game is available now.

‘Deadly Demolition Derby’ is a car combat racing video game that combines destruction and driving tactics in a fast paced racing environment.

The aim of the game is to win the race whilst destroying other racers' cars. Players receive points based on the amount of damage they do to other cars. Players are awarded with time bonus for causing as much damage amongst contestants as they can as well as surviving the round.

Let´s demolish some cars ,because someone has to do it.
